items.title: Intel, Adobe and these other ‘AI loser’ stocks could get left behind in the next phase of the tech boom
items.description: These 12 tech companies are most vulnerable to having their business models upended by the AI revolution, according to Wedbush Securities.

items.title: Your estate plan needs to be absolutely airtight. Here’s how to avoid mistakes.
items.description: If you don’t understand something in a document, don’t sign it.

items.title: How Nvidia’s stock can benefit from this emerging trend in AI models
items.description: As the industry shifts toward AI models with better memory and understanding, Citi expects a new Nvidia offering to best its competitors.

items.title: Why this veteran strategist is dropping his preference for tech stocks after 15 years
items.description: More competition is coming for the “juicy profit margins” of the “Magnificent Seven,” Ed Yardeni said, and he’s ready to look elsewhere for gains.

items.title: Paramount launches hostile bid for Warner Bros. with $108.4 billion offer, besting Netflix by $25 billion
